column3: Discussed with @laanwj on IRC and i'll try now to remove the set of timers, I think having only one timer makes things more stable for future changes.\n

Concept ACK, but the change in logic needs to be more explicit. This is too fragile against refactors/reorders (at least for master, for 0.12 as a quick last minute patch it'd be acceptable...).\n(as discussed on IRC)\n

Added a commit that removes the `std::vector` for RPCTimerInterfaces (just one pointer now). Also added a function (`RPCSetTimerInterfaceIfUnset`) that prevents setting a Qt bases timer interface if already only is set.\nNot meant for back porting (will open "the" simple fix for 0.12).\n
